Name: Sylvarcon 2049: A Cybersecurity Adventure
About the game: By the iHackLabs technical team . The technical team that made iHackLabs possible presents Sylvarcon:2049, a new concept of training and learning cybersecurity. Lazarus Era . It is the year 2049. After a series of devastating pandemics in the 2020s, millions have died with each new wave of viruses. While institutions rushed to implement emergency countermeasures, entire economies collapsed, and governments were overthrown and then replaced by pharma mega-corporations. Arising from the ashes emerges a singular corporation empowered to manage the strains of viruses and control the citizens effectively. The Lazarus system was designed to address the law and monitor each citizen's health to ensure individuals' safety within quarantined cities worldwide. Its algorithms will select vaccine-worthy citizens and maintain the new status quo. Forensic Analyst . Claire is a digital forensics expert who desperately wants to know the truth about what happened to her mother; Hacker (coming soon in 2023) in DLC . Ethan is an expert hacker who wants to discover why his brother was murdered. Both will struggle to discover the truth through real-life challenges of their specialty. Real environments where to practice cybersecurity . This game allows players to learn real hacking techniques and digital forensics analysis. This video game features and includes real challenges developed by cybersecurity experts that will allow players, through a virtual machine, to experience and resolve challenges in a natural environment. Learn cybersecurity with Sylvarcon:2049 . If you are looking for a game where you can simulate that you are a Hacker or Digital Forensic, playing Sylvarcon 2049 may frustrate you. On the other hand, if you want to understand how hacking works, you will find in Sylvarcon 2049 a new world that can become your future. Sylvarcon 2049 will allow you to learn and practice basic and advanced techniques while developing a unique story that immerses the player in a new and unique platform. We have combined all the power of Unity with virtual machines that will deliver an unprecedented learning experience and practice cybersecurity within an exciting video game.
